instructions:
A partially-automated character sheet for 13th Age Glorantha, with some extra customisation options for homebrew settings.

Version: 1.0

If you find bugs or have suggestions, please use the [Github issue tracker](https://github.com/Seraaron/roll20-character-sheets/issues) for this sheet.

Click here for the usage [README](https://github.com/Seraaron/roll20-character-sheets/blob/master/13th%20Age%20Glorantha/README.md) and the [ChangeLogs](https://github.com/Seraaron/roll20-character-sheets/blob/master/13th%20Age%20Glorantha/ChangeLog.md).
